feature.label: Internet Application Cleaner/Formatter
feature.description:
This project aims to provide a Java-based code syntax formatter for a diverse range of web languages, including HTML, Javascript, PHP, CSS and JSP.
It allows you to format complex, messy web application code into a more structured format.
To achieve this, it uses specialised reader/writer implementations and a custom parser. As a result, this formatter is fragile at best, so use at your own risk! However, it does come with a set of automated test cases, to ensure that it generally outputs suitable code.
